diff_hunk:
@@ -90,9 +91,9 @@ def default_collate(batch):
             storage = batch[0].storage()._new_shared(numel)
             out = batch[0].new(storage)
         return torch.stack(batch, 0, out=out)

body: Oh okay, I see what you mean. Sorry I was confused because the code checks the type of the first element of batch (`batch[0]`), not the type of batch itself. Fix incoming.
